label: 大極殿
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: The main hall of the Administration Palace (Chōdō-in). Where the Sovereign (Tennō) attended to special affairs of state, and where the great ceremonies of national importance were held. [長堂院、天皇]
